**City of Lubbock Elected Officials**

Mark W. McBrayer - Mayor (Term Expires May 2026)

Christy Martinez-Garcia - City Council District 1 (Term Expires May 2026)

Gordon Harris - City Council District 2 (Term Expires May 2028)

David Glasheen - City Council District 3 (Term Expires May 2026)

Brayden Rose - City Council District 4 (Term Expires May 2028)

Dr. Jennifer Wilson - City Council District 5 (Term Expires May 2026)

Tim Collins - City Council District 6 (Term Expires May 2028)

Jorge E. Hernandez - Municipal Court Judge (Term Expires May 2028)

* 18 years of age or older
* Resided continuously in the state for 12 months
* Resided continuously in the territory for 6 months.

**Qualifications of Mayor, Council Members, and other Officials as outlined in the City of Lubbock Charter, Ch. 1, Art. IX, Sec. 4:**

* Shall be a resident citizen of the City of Lubbock.
* Shall be bona fide residents within the City and within the applicable District at the time of filing for office.
* Must continue to reside within the City and the applicable District during the term of office.
* Shall not be indebted to the City of Lubbock.
* Shall not be interested in the profits or emoluments of any contract, job, work or service for the municipality or interested in the sale to the City of any supplies, equipment, material or articles purchased.
* Any member of the City Council shall not have a substantial interest in any public utility operating within the City of Lubbock, nor be in the employ of any person having a substantial interest in any public utility operating within the City of Lubbock. (Substantial interest shall mean substantial interest as defined by the laws of the State of Texas regulating conflicts of interest of officers of municipalities.)
